title: 2 Bed 1 Bath. Elevator Building. 24/7 Door Attendants. Utilities incl.
description:
We are looking for someone to take over our 1 year lease of our 2 bedroom 1 bathroom  apartment in Center City starting September 1st, 2022.
Rent: $2191/mo (ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED!)
Location: The Westbury, 271 S 15th St.
We are moving out and looking for someone to take over our lease renewal. The lease is for one year starting Sept 1 2022, though move in could potentially be available a few days before then. If interested, we would connect you with the Westbury leasing office, and then you would apply through there. The lease would be put in your name.
Apartment:
It is a light filled corner unit in a high rise apartment elevator building with 24/7 front desk attendants and lobby. You enter into the kitchen with oven, refrigerator, and dishwasher. Continue to the living room with new hardwood floors. Next, the bathroom with a black and white tiled floor. Finally, two bedrooms of similar size. There are 3 closets total, all are very deep and the one in one of the bedrooms is the largest.
Overall experience:
- There are two elevators in the building. You will have one reserved for you move which makes moving in and out very easy.
- Building is clean, and well maintained.
- Front desk staff are very friendly, who are there 24/7. There is a mail room where the front desk can take receipt and hold onto your packages until you are free to pick them up.
- This unit shares one wall with another apartment, but we haven't heard any noise from any of the other units. It is a very quiet building where most of the residents are young professionals
- Location is very convenient! You can easily walk to any of the nice restaurants and bars in Center City and you are close to public transportation.
- There is laundry in the basement of the building.
- The building is pet friendly. Both cats and dogs are allowed.
- You're not going to find something this centrally located, with this much space, for less money.
Feel free to text or shoot any email. We are currently living here and can show the apartment in the evenings after work.

description: Welcome to your new home in Brewerytown! Be the first to live in this renovated 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home. You'll delight in the quality of the renovation and the space. Enter through the foyer into the open-concept floorplan outfitted with a modern kitchen featuring a complete suite of stainless steel appliances. There are plenty of brand new, gorgeous cherry cabinetry in the kitchen to store all your goodies. The elegant marble countertops set off the modern aesthetic. Outfitted with an overhang for barstool seating, there's no need to take up any space with an oversized formal dining room table, but you could if dinner parties are your thing. Filled with the warmth of bright natural light and the organic beauty of hardwood floors throughout, you'll be able to relax and enjoy house plants and a good book any time of year. No need to spend money on decorations, the colorful feature walls will showcase all your personal touches. Walk through the spacious living area to find a first floor bedroom suitable for a home office. Upstairs features a newly updated spa-like bathroom with custom tile and the two nicely-sized bedrooms. The master bedroom can fit larger furniture and is flooded with natural light. The full basement is outfitted with a washer and dryer and provides ample space for additional storage. This home is available to rent immediately, 12 month lease minimum (long-term lease options preferred), and is conveniently located a block away from Ridge Avenue, SEPTA bus line 61 with access to Center City, Manayunk, and SEPTA bus line 3 to for access to Broad Street and Frankfort Transportation Center. title: Welcome to the Aria Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Aria Condominium, conveniently situated at the crossroads of Rittenhouse Square and the Avenue of the Arts. This Edmund Gilchrist skyscraper was built in 1929 and is considered to be one of the finest examples of Beaux-Arts architecture in Philadelphia. Converted to condominiums in 2008, each residence features high-end finishes including wood flooring of varying shades; a gourmet kitchen with wood cabinetry, tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, GE Profile stainless steel appliances including a gas range; Kohler bathroom fixtures, and in-residence Bosch front-loading washer and dryer. Residents enjoy a 24-hour doorman and concierge; state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio; owner"s lounge and clubroom with a flat-screen TV, DVD, surround sound, pool table, executive board room, and caterer's kitchen; guest suite; business center and library and a bike room in the basement. This is a pet-friendly building with a pet spa and dog run. Multiple, reasonably-priced monthly parking options are available nearby. Convenient to Philadelphia's cultural epicenter, gourmet dining, world-class shopping, and all major transportation lines/hubs.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 2210 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 22nd floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Enjoy the rest of summer in this
description:
Enjoy the rest of summer in this Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property originally designed in 1951! Enter through the spacious remodeled lobby where you are greeted by a 24 hour front desk attendant. title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, Washer and Dryer, Gym
description:
The home at 2402 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 24th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as August 19, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery.

* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room

* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.

* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views

* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* 24th floor apartment home
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home at 1,180 square feet
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

title: Beautiful courtyards, Seasonal Bike Share Program, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Furnished 2 Bed 40th St.
description:
Unit 3 is a stylishly furnished two-bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with two spacious closets, a TV and kitchen supplies. The 2nd bedroom is currently used as an office and dining room space but the owner is willing to remove the table and supply an additional bed for the new tenants. Other furniture can be supplied based on your needs and availability of supplies. If you would like to include all utilities and wifi in the rent an extra $150/mo can be added to the rent total.  1-year lease is preferred but the owner is open to a short-term lease (3-month minimum). First, last and security deposit is required for move-in. The building has been fitted with security cameras. This unit is located on the 2nd floor up a flight of stairs.
More about the location: 618 N. 40th St. is a recently renovated historic property located a block from the fast-developing business corridors of Lancaster Ave. and Haverford Ave. The building sits at the intersection of the Belmont, Powelton and Mantua neighborhoods and is a 15 minute walk to Drexel's campus, Penn Presbyterian Medical Center, University of Pennsylvania facilities and steps away from public transportation leading into Center City. The building boasts noticeable character seen in intricate carvings found on interior and exterior exposed brick walls and original wood moldings.
618 N 40th St is an apartment community located in Philadelphia County and the 19104 ZIP Code.

title: Wonderful Fitler Sq 3 bed 2 ba home + patio, finished basement & more!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available Now!
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

This is one of the most desired locations in Philadelphia to live and is extremely commuter-friendly, family-friendly, and a trendy area for working professionals, couples, and individuals of all backgrounds who love to live and work within a vibrant and lively area while still having a residential feel in a peaceful neighborhood with nearby parks/green spaces. It is right by SEPTA Broad Street Line (Lombard-South station), and connecting SEPTA bus lines.

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!
